About Me

I'm a strategic consultant and writer who helps B2B companies navigate the complex challenges of scaling, competition, and market transitions.

ðŸ“Š

10+ Years

Strategic Consulting Experience

My Approach to Strategy

I believe the best strategies emerge from deep understanding of market dynamics, customer behavior, and competitive positioning. My approach combines rigorous analysis with practical implementation, ensuring that strategic insights translate into measurable business results.

Over the past decade, I've worked with over 50+ B2B companies, helping them navigate everything from go-to-market strategy to competitive positioning to platform business model transitions. My work has contributed to over $200M in additional revenue for my clients.

I share my insights through my weekly newsletter, which reaches 10,000+ business leaders, and through speaking engagements at conferences and companies worldwide.

Background & Experience

The journey that led me to strategic consulting and thought leadership.

Early Career: Operations & Analytics

Started my career in operations and business analytics at a fast-growing SaaS company, where I learned firsthand how data-driven decision making drives sustainable growth.

2012-2015

Strategy Leadership: Scaling Teams

Led strategic initiatives at a $50M professional services firm, managing go-to-market strategy for new service lines and competitive positioning against traditional players.

2015-2019

Independent Consulting: Focused Expertise

Launched my consulting practice to focus specifically on B2B strategy, working with companies ranging from early-stage startups to established enterprises.

2019-Present

Core Beliefs

The principles that guide my work and thinking.

Strategy Must Be Actionable

The best strategies in the world are worthless if they can't be implemented. I focus on developing strategic frameworks that teams can actually execute on.

Data Informs, Judgment Decides

While data is essential for understanding markets and customers, human judgment is what turns information into strategic advantage. I help leaders make better decisions.

Competitive Advantage Is Temporary

Markets evolve rapidly, and what works today may not work tomorrow. I help companies build adaptive strategies that can evolve with changing conditions.

Culture Eats Strategy

Even the best strategy will fail without organizational alignment and cultural support. I work with leadership teams to ensure strategic initiatives have the support they need.

Beyond Work

What drives me outside of consulting and writing.

Continuous Learning

I'm constantly reading, researching, and learning about new business models, technologies, and strategic frameworks. Knowledge compounds, and I believe in staying at the forefront of strategic thinking.

Mentoring & Teaching

I mentor several early-career professionals interested in strategy and consulting, and occasionally guest lecture at business schools on strategic planning and competitive analysis.

Let's Connect

Interested in working together or just want to say hello? I'd love to hear from you.
